activity: Quick Espresso Stop at Röstbar Münster
description: Grab a quick espresso or cappuccino at Röstbar, a specialty coffee shop known for its excellent brews and cozy atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: A small yet vibrant coffee shop that offers high-quality coffee, perfect for a quick energy boost before continuing your day.
safetyTips: Check peak hours for available seating.
Inform staff about any allergies when ordering.

activity: Quick Photo Stop at St. Lamberti Church
description: Take a short stop to admire and capture photos of the historic St. Lamberti Church, a landmark in Münster’s city center.

locationInfo.description: A Gothic-style church with an impressive facade, known for its iconic towers and historical significance.
safetyTips: Be mindful of ongoing services while visiting.
Stay on designated paths to respect the site.

description: Cool down with a delicious scoop of ice cream at Eispavillon, one of Münster’s favorite ice cream spots.

locationInfo.description: A popular ice cream parlor offering a variety of flavors, perfect for a short and sweet break on a warm day.
safetyTips: Check for allergens in flavors before ordering.
Keep an eye on personal belongings in busy areas.

description: Take a brief walk through Prinzipalmarkt, Münster’s historic shopping street lined with beautiful arcades and boutiques.

locationInfo.description: A historic street with charming buildings, luxury stores, and cafés, making it a perfect spot for a quick scenic walk.
safetyTips: Watch out for cyclists and pedestrians.
Be cautious of uneven pavement when walking.

activity: Catch a Sunset View at Aaseeterrassen
description: Spend a few minutes enjoying the serene sunset view at Aaseeterrassen, a popular lakeside gathering spot.

locationInfo.description: A lakeside terrace offering a great spot to relax and admire the picturesque sunset over Aasee.
safetyTips: Be cautious when sitting near the water’s edge.
Keep an eye on personal belongings in public areas.
